DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_TILE_POTENCIAL_MES_1
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT SUM(VALORTOTAL) POTENCIAL,
 (
 SELECT SUM(E.VALOR)
 FROM K_CRM_METAS B
 JOIN K_CRM_METASUNIDADES C ON B.HANDLE = C.META
 JOIN K_CRM_METASPERIODOS D ON C.HANDLE = D.METAUNIDADE
 JOIN K_CRM_METASPERIODOSTIPOS E ON D.HANDLE = E.METAPERIODO
 WHERE MONTH(D.DATA) = MONTH(GETDATE()) AND YEAR(D.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE())
 ) TOTAL
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES
WHERE MONTH(DATAFECHAMENTO) = MONTH(GETDATE()) AND YEAR(DATAFECHAMENTO) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND STATUS NOT IN (3,5,9)
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="POTENCIAL" From="A" Path="POTENCIAL" /> <Field Alias="TOTAL" From="A" Path="TOTAL" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
